attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It may not be feasible to supply freely on the NHS "sea - bands" to pregnant women to alleviate pregnancy related nausea and morning sickness, but please encourage hospitals to ensure that this useful non - invasive acupressure remedy is available in their clinic shops cheaply for pregnant women and recommended to alleviate morning sickness in pregnancy.

Thank you.
